From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Lunarpine opened his eyes, a blueish haze seemed to surround him he fealt
odd and a little sick. He remembered passing out.

Lunarpine was in some kind of chamber similar to a stasis pod he glared out
the glasslike front trying to focus his eyes. he heard the gurgleing bubbles
of the tank around him. H tried to smell the air but only got a nostril of
the strange fluid he was being bathed in. His eyes slowly focussed on an
image outside the chamber,

Veratis stood outside at a control pannel looking at the status of his new
guinee pig (Figure of speach, he didn't really turn Lunarpine into a guinee
pig.) "Ah you're awake then it would seem I was successful." The scientist
looked his subject up and down.

"If I get out of here I'm going to shred you  so bad that it'll take a
master welder to reassemble you." Lunarpine thought, knowing he couldn't
speak through the liquid.

"That's not a nice thing to think about the bot who just improved you." The
science bot somehow knew what Lunarpine was thinking and Lunarpine just
realized he could hear Veratis through the noisy liquid. "It would appear
you've been hiding things from me. Now is that any way to treat a gracious
host?"

Lunarpine didn't understand any of this but he had to find out. "How do you
know what I'm thinking? Curiosity killed the cat, Lunarpine is a wolf so he
was safe.

"I rerouted your thought patterns through this computer, I did the same with
my own so you could understand me." Veratis seemed sure of himself and his
wacky experiments but he didn't seem to be gloating. "Now that I answered
that question it's my turn." His grin showed that he had the upper hand and
he knew it. "Who's Shadow Wing, I got a distinct image while you were
absent."

The look on Lunarpines face told Veratis all he needed to know.
